text: The 31st District of the Wisconsin Senate is located in central Wisconsin, and is currently composed of parts of Buffalo, Trempealeau, Pierce, Pepin, Dunn, Eau Claire, Clark, Monroe and Jackson counties. ==Current elected officials== Jeff Smith is the senator serving the 31st district. He was elected in 2018 for the first time, having previously served in the Wisconsin Assembly.{http://wqow.com/news/top-stories/2018/11/06/jeff-smith-defeats-two- other-candidates-for-district-31-senate-seat/} The area of the 31st Senate District contains three State Assembly Districts: * The 91st (represented by Jodi Emerson) * The 92nd (represented by Treig Pronschinske) * The 93rd (represented by Warren Petryk) The district is located mostly within Wisconsin's 3rd congressional district, which is represented by U.S. Representative Ron Kind. ==Past senators== Previous senators include:Wisconsin Blue Book, 1991-92 edition, Statistics: History, pages 657-666. * Kathleen Vinehout, 2007-2018 * Ron Brown, 2002-2006 * Rodney C. Moen, 1983–2003 * Thomas Harnisch, 1975-1983 * Raymond Johnson * Amrose B. Coller, 1939-1942 * James Earl Leverich * Howard Teasdale, 1911-1931 * James J. McGillivray * Henry Conner * Thomas A. Dyson, 1887-1891 * Donald A. McDonald, 1883-1886 * Gysbert Van Steenwyk, Sr., 1879-1880 * Merrick Wing, 1877-1878, 1881-1882 * Sylvester Nevins, 1875-1876 * Cyrus M. Butt, 1869-1870 * Edwin Flint, 1862 Note: the boundaries of districts have changed repeatedly over history. Previous politicians of a specific numbered district have represented a completely different geographic area, due to redistricting. ==Notes== ==External links== *District Website *Senator Smith's Website Category:Wisconsin State Senate districts Category:Buffalo County, Wisconsin Category:Trempealeau County, Wisconsin Category:Pepin County, Wisconsin Category:Pierce County, Wisconsin Category:Dunn County, Wisconsin Category:Eau Claire County, Wisconsin Category:Clark County, Wisconsin Category:Jackson County, Wisconsin Category:Monroe County, Wisconsin
title: Wisconsin Senate, District 31
